wikipedia_page.main: Alfred Augustus Mathews (7 February 1864 – 12 August 1946) was a Welsh priest who was notable as a rugby union player in his youth; representing Lampeter at club level and playing a single international match for Wales.

link_mentions.page: Henry Brooke, Baron Brooke of Cumnor
response: Brooke married Barbara Muriel, daughter of the Reverend Alfred Mathews, in 1933. As she was made a life peer, too, they were one of the few couples who both held titles in their own right. The couple had four children:
